body_html: I disagree with this change. By spec, IN should always use data stats rather than running stats, no matter in training or testing. So this arg should have nothing to do whether it is in training mode. The _use_running_stats flag provides additional functionality, which shouldn't be associated with either training or eval mode, if user want to use.
